name: Pillage
description: The mix of Survival & Parody. Play alone or with your friends! Your mission is to survive in the middle of the strange...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit,  Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit, Processor: 4-Cores 2,3 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit,  Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit, Processor: 4-Cores 2,3 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB Storage: 2 GB available space
